Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory14.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'And that is what happened.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "After returning from Hydrangea Island, I became Scarab's new captain.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Though to be fair, V pretty much forced me into it.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata tosses a liquor-filled mint candy into the air and catches it in her mouth.'}
{3: "She then pats the Medic Bot's shoulder with an exaggerated look of despair."}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'I never knew you had to write so many mission reports.', 4: '1'}

{2: 'Yata', 3: "They're saying the combat environment was complex this time, so I have to write detailed reports about everything—the Red Tide's spread patterns, consciousness projection responses, environmental conditions on Hydrangea Island, and all that other stuff.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I have six hands and I'm still here struggling!", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Yata, what are you mumbling about to "Shorthalt"?', 4: '1'}
{3: "The Medic Bot blinks repeatedly, apparently sharing Shiva's confusion."}
{3: "The robot, once Shorthalt's target of drunkenly embrace whenever he let himself have one too many drinks, adopted Shorthalt's name after his passing."}
{3: 'Now it accepts all sorts of peculiar offerings while serving as a silent confidant.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'Long story short, the Scarabs failed to capture their mission target and got punished—now they\'re on a "wonderful" mandatory vacation.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'The Red Tide was so dangerous that even Nikola had nothing to say about it, though V—our resident workaholic—was visibly irked.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'In her words, this isn\'t a vacation, it\'s... uh, "just another form of confinement", yeah.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Hey, Shorthalt.', 4: '1'}
{3: "Yata's playful expression fades as she becomes serious."}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Say... do you think Scarab is gonna turn out fine with me as the new captain...?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'I mean... I just feel like I have to know a billion things to be a captain.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Would you feel as lost as I did when crises like this happen out of the blue...? How do people usually cope with it anyway?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "I'm just scared... scared of losing anyone close to me again.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "So do impart your wisdom like you used to whenever you're free. I'll pay you in mint candy.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'It isn\'t until Yata gets on her feet that she sees that "Shorthalt" already has a heap\'s worth of gifts sitting on its head.'}
{3: "Wanshi's cushion, Discord's scissors, Shiva's tarot cards, various flavors of alcoholic electrolyte from Shorthalt's drinking buddies, and much more."}
{3: 'People throughout Babylonia share a special bond with him. Whenever they wish to confide in him, they leave gifts for the Medic Bot, just like this.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: "Here you go. Make them last—we've got a limited supply of these things.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata ceremoniously places five liquor-filled mint candies atop the heap of gifts.'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory0.png', 2: '1'}
{3: 'In the distance, a shadowy figure quietly stops the recording. Beneath their mask, the corners of their mouth curl into a subtle smile.'}
{3: "She knows she won't be getting any reply, but she still taps her terminal all the same and sends the video to a communication port."}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Alright, Yata, sober up. We've got a mission.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'I will.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'After sizing things up, the Commander figures Hydrangea Island is a pretty decent spot, facilities-wise.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'If we can successfully decontaminate and reconstruct it, it could be reopened as a ground fortress.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "Yata, since you're familiar with the island, this mission has been assigned to you.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'Decontamination? But the Red Tide drowned the island, no?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: 'No, the Red Tide only drowned the school building where we were and went away soon after that.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "But we can't assume it's completely safe. There are still Corrupted remaining on the island.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "So, we're heading out on another mission?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Valeria', 3: "No, you'll be going with Gray Raven's Commandant only. The rest of Scarab is still under disciplinary confinement.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Oh... Gray Raven's Commandant, huh...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'Yata mutters the name in a daze before suddenly snapping back to her senses.'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: 'V, please give me some hangover electrolyte for Constructs.', 4: '2'}
{3: 'With practiced ease, Valeria finds a bottle in the cabinet and tosses it across the room to Yata.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Shiva', 3: 'Why are you being so serious all of a sudden?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Yata', 3: 'I used to consult the valedictorian about tactical matters, and they would always walk me through my questions in detail.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Yata', 3: "Last time, I even invited them to work out at the gym together. I've been wanting to explore other places with them too.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Valeria', 3: "Don't treat this like a vacation. Watch out for the Corrupted.", 4: '1'}
{3: 'Yata downs the hangover drink in one go and waves dismissively at Valeria.'}
{3: 'She shoulders her powered arm pack and leaves the lounge.'}
